title: Anti-Claim

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Once per day, you may shoot a player. Guess their role. If you are correct, you gun them down without remorse.
- At night, select a player. If you gun them down the following day, there will be no hanging. 3 uses.

desc:
Post 4827
*Screw claiming, all my homies HATE claiming!*
